name: contact-keeper
description: Following along [Udemy Course: React Front To Back](https://www.udemy.com/course/modern-react-front-to-back/) by [Brad Traversy](https://github.com/bradtraversy)

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" " cd client && npm run start"
scripts.install-client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
